overview: Hot Desert Knights is proud to celebrate "20 Years of HDK BOYS". Real uninhibited boys doing what young studs do best - Raw, Hot, Sweaty, Bareback Sex. To celebrate HDK's 20th Anniversary making bareback movies we are releasing the 2nd in a set of 3 special collectors editions, each dedicated to a specific genre: HDK MEN, HDK BOYS & HDK FISTING This 2nd edition is a special collector's edition of our greatest bareback moments from the past two decades featuring nothing but uninhibited horny young HDK BOYS.
title: 20 Years of HDK Boys
